name: 'Star Trek' Ferengi Trivia Game | 'Star Trek' - Species and Planets | 10 Questions

questions.text: The first appearance of the Ferengi was:
The captain of a Ferengi starship has this title:
TNG: With whom was the Ferengi named Tog in love?
The leader of the Ferengi has this title:
Who first played Quark's mother Ishka?
questions.explanation:
Andrea Martin.

	In ep 'Family Business'. Cecily Adams took over the role for the remainder of the series.

questions.text: Armin Shimerman (Quark), Max Grodenchik (Rom), and Aron Eisenberg (Nog) have all played another Ferengi role each.
questions.explanation:
false & f.

	Shimmerman played Letek in TNG ep 'The Last Outpost', Grodenchik played Sovak in TNG ep 'Captain's Holiday'. But Eisenberg has only played the Ferengi Nog. He has, however, played two other parts in Trek lore: a newspaper vendor in DS9 ep 'Far Beyond the Stars' and Kar, a Kazon youth, in VOY ep 'Initiations'.

questions.text: What is the medium of commerce exchange in Ferengi society?
questions.explanation:
latinum.

	Latinum, gold-pressed and shaped into various sizes.

questions.text: At the end of DS9, who ends up being the leader of the Ferengi? (Thought I was going to give you the answer to question 4, didn't you?)
questions.explanation:
Rom.

	Through miscommunication, Quark though he was going to be tapped by Zek to take over. Zek thought he was talking to Rom.

Jeffrey Combs.

	Combs also played the Vorta called Weyoun, sometimes having to portray both characters for the same episode.

questions.text: DS9 ep 'Little Green Men': Where did Quark, Rom, and Nog awake after crash-landing their malfunctioning shuttle?
questions.explanation:
Roswell, NM.

	They time travel back to 1947 and are found by the US military.
